item.title: Types of Coffee beans
item.description: Types of Coffee beans - The Four Primary Species of Coffee Beans: A Comprehensive Guide Coffee, one of the most beloved beverages worldwide, owes its diverse flavors and characteristics to the different species of coffee beans. While there are numerous species, four primary ones dominate the global coffee market. In this guide, we’ll explore each species in detail. 1. Arabica (Coffea arabica) Arabica coffee beans are the most popular and widely consumed species of coffee worldwide, accounting for about 60-70% of global coffee production.
